mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.bumen_id as bumenId ,a.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,a.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,a.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,a.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,bumen.bumen_name as bumenName ,bumen.bumen_zhize as bumenZhize ,bumen.bumen_number as bumenNumber ,bumen.bumen_content as bumenContent
FROM yonghu a left JOIN bumen bumen ON a.bumen_id = bumen.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and ( a.bumen_id = #{params.bumenId} )
and a.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and a.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and a.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and a.bumen_id IS NOT NULL
and bumen.bumen_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.bumenName},'%')
and bumen.bumen_zhize like CONCAT('%',#{params.bumenZhize},'%')
and bumen.bumen_number >= #{params.bumenNumberStart}
and bumen.bumen_number <= #{params.bumenNumberEnd}
and bumen.bumen_number = #{params.bumenNumber}
and bumen.bumen_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.bumenContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(bumen.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(bumen.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
